page.title: 12TELEVISION SURVEY
page.content:
Television is a wooden box with screens between 5 and 24 inches. There are 4 channels BBC1,BBC2,ITV and CHANNEL 4. We did a survey on television programes children in our school liked best. They voted for their favourite programes out of a list of 6. Here is a table of the percentages :_
============================ AUF WEIDERSEIN PET 37% STREET HAWK 19% GRANGE HILL 12% KNIGHT RIDER 11% 6 MILLION DOLLAR MAN 7% HARDCASTLE AND MCORMICK ============================ Auf Weidersein Pet is about 6 men who work on a building site.They are always drinking and swearing.
